short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Book Report is the best way for indie authors and publishers to track their sales data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Book Report automatically fetches your latest sales numbers and turns them into simple, insightful reports. We don't ask for your password, and your sales data is always fully encrypted, so you can have peace of mind that your data is safe.
